3.0.14.en: Limited compability to Homey firmware v4.1.x

3.0.16.en: Fixed some issues with window coverings

3.0.17.en: Work around issue with Aqara curtains

3.0.18.en: Added support for double/triple/... lights and sockets

3.0.20.en: Removed custom services/characteristics, fixed possible crash

3.0.22.en: Handle unknown devices better. Also remove paired devices configuration when doing a reset.

3.1.0.en: Show device zone on settings page, fixed search

3.2.0.en: Added support for HomeKit Controller app

4.1.1.en: More fixes to work around issues in SDKv3 on v7.4.X-rc.Y

4.1.2.en: Work around more issues in the Web API

4.1.3.en: Limit the number of bridged accessories

4.1.5.en: Work around yet more issues in SDKv3

4.1.8.en: Make sure all devices are ready before being added to the bridge

4.2.en: Add fan support for MELCloud thermostats
